org.drombler.commons.action

Class AbstractToggleActionListener<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.commons.action.AbstractActionListener<E>
      • org.drombler.commons.action.AbstractToggleActionListener<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of the action event
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener<E>, ToggleActionListener<E>, org.softsmithy.lib.beans.Bean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractActiveContextSensitiveToggleActionListener, AbstractApplicationContextSensitiveToggleActionListener

    public abstract class AbstractToggleActionListener<E>
extends AbstractActionListener<E>
implements ToggleActionListener<E>
    A base class for ToggleActionListeners.
    Author:
    puce
